card.name: CW / CC - Image Viewer Limitations Per Client

data.text:
@yasserogier @gillianoberholzer @stefanbar 

This change was originally spec'd for just judgments and DR. However, now that there are more types, it would be prudent to include all types.

Judgments
Debt Review
Admin Orders (we will be taking over this system soon)
Index 360
MBOD

That way, we could assign types to specific clients and then they only have access to those types.
